extendedInfo.description: The Construction Master 5 calculator for your Android smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator app, for Carpenters, Builders & More.Save time with solutions for Contractors, Builders, Carpenters, Architects, Engineers, Tradespersons and Advanced Do-It-Yourselfersâ¢ You get ALL of the functionality of the handheld Construction Master 5 calculator.â¢ Calculate tough construction-math problems and reduce errors on the jobsite or in the office.â¢ Reduce costly errors and save time and money. It will help you and your crew on every phase of your projects â estimating, bidding and building.FEATURES:â¢ Created by Calculated Industries, the originator of the award-winning Construction Master calculatorsâ¢ All the functionality and solutions of the handheld Construction Master 5 and optimized for the Android smartphone userâ¢ Built-in help â just press and hold the desired key for full, clear definitions, explanations and examples of keystrokesâ¢ Powerful built-in solutions make it ideal to calculate layouts, plans, bids and estimatesâ¢ Work in and convert between all building dimensional formats: feet-inch-fractions, inch fraction, yards, decimal feet (10ths, 100ths), decimal inches and metric (m, cm, mm)â¢ Built-in right angle functions simplify square-ups, rafters, slopes and moreâ¢ Calculate Areas and VolumesDimensional Math and Conversionsâ¢ Feet-Inch-Fraction, Inch Fraction, Yards â¢ Decimal Feet (10ths, 100ths), Decimal Inches â¢ Preset Fraction Conversions (1/2" through 1/64") â¢ Full Metric Conversions Function (m, cm, mm) Right Angle Solutionsâ¢ Complete Right Angle/Rafter Calculations â¢ Pitch Key (Slope and Grade) â¢ Calculate Rise, Run, Diagonal/Common Rafters â¢ Hip/Valley Key â¢ Jack Rafters Key â¢ Irregular Hip/Valley Rafters and Jack Raftersâ¢ Stair Layout Key for easy stair calculationsâ¢ Diagonal Key â¢ Expanded Rake-Wall Area and Volume Solutionsâ¢ Square and Cubic â¢ Basic Circular Calculations â¢ Weight per Volume Conversions Special Functionsâ¢ Calculate Board Feet â¢ User-Definable Preferences â¢ Haptic Feedback (optional)â¢ Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a fingerâ¢ Cost per Unit (Total costs based on unit price) â¢ Paperless Tape â¢ Memory functionIdeal for Contractors, Builders, Carpenters, Architects, Engineers, Tradespersons and Advanced Do-It-Yourselfers

reviews.title: Best App
reviews.comment: Does what the 80$ model does....but this one is always with me, on the job or on an estimate.  Thanks!!
reviews.author: Wit Phelps

reviews.title: Construction 5 calculator
reviews.comment: Its convenient when you dont have the time.
reviews.author: Austin Ulrich

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I\'ve stopped using my dedicated calculator because this is always in my pocket and ready to go.  Great app Thanks calculated industries
reviews.author: Skye Cohen

reviews.title: Better than the original!
reviews.comment: My original version broke.  I  paid for this app, saved money, and its always with me!
reviews.author: Mark Wilkinson

reviews.title: Worth it!
reviews.comment: Best app I\'ve ever paid for. Works just like the real thing and I always have it with me, no need to dig into my tool box.
reviews.author: Josiah Pratt

reviews.title: Great but annoying?
reviews.comment: This is a fine calculator but needs constant data service to be used.  I use it all the time as a carpenter,  but in areas of poor service I\'m out of luck.
reviews.author: Kris Morey

reviews.title: Works exactly as calculator
reviews.comment: Works just like the actual calculator. I had it on three different phones now personally with no problems whatsoever. When you take into account all my coworker and the differnt phones they use its more like 30 different phones with no complaints at all! Not sure why to say about the couple bad reviews here. My guess is some version of operator error.
reviews.author: Mike J McClendon

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Worst app ive ever bought. Waste of $15!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is the best tool on my desk
reviews.comment: Never without my CM5 now.  It is worth every penny
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t hold up to the real calculator
reviews.comment: I own the physical model in my office and love the calculator. Great set up and functionality. However the app which i was excited to have mobile is a let down do to the fact i can change any of the preferences. Seems your forced to use the settings as they are and that is frustrating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really?? Won\'t stay set to 1/16\'s amongst other issues. Very disappointing for what I paid and forget about customer service. Might as well be non-existent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best application
reviews.comment: I used it all the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dave
reviews.comment: Im a carpenter and use it as much as my hammer. Awesome!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: Just what I wanted. Less than half the price at home depot or lowes
reviews.author: douglas reynolds

reviews.title: Pos
reviews.comment: Cannot give it a zero. Took my money.
reviews.author: A Google User
